DOC.brief_title: High Volume Foleys Increasing Vaginal Birth Pilot Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Approximately 1/3 first-time mother ( nulliparous woman ) undergo induction labour deliver cesarean . Cesarean delivery negative consequence initial subsequent pregnancy . Women cesarean first pregnancy likely cesarean follow pregnancy group large contributor overall cesarean delivery rate . Therefore , target intervention prevent cesarean nulliparous woman undergo induction labour substantial impact overall cesarean delivery rate . Adequate ripen prepare cervix induction find decrease risk cesarean . This do variety method , prostaglandin ( chemical messenger ) Foley fill moderate volume fluid . These method find equal regarding risk cesarean delivery . However , meta-analysis team discover trend towards decrease risk cesarean cervical ripen undertaken Foleys fill high volume fluid ( 80cc ) compare fill low volume ( 30cc ) .Most Canadian Obstetricians use prostaglandin cervical ripening . To assess 80cc Foleys result low risk cesarean , need compare Canadian standard prostaglandin . Therefore randomize controlled trial require . The Greater-Toronto-Area Obstetric ( GTA-OB ) Network group hospital commit facilitate research set plan large scale trial . The large scale trial aim demonstrate difference rate cesarean 38 % 31 % , require enrollment 1442 woman . It estimate 5,437 woman meet entry criterion GTA-OB network year , Â½ approach , 20 % need consent complete trial 3 year . Therefore , pilot study determine recruitment rate potentially achievable inform design strategy ensure success . The discovery simple , non- pharmacological , cost effective manner cervical ripening decrease risk cesarean would change clinical practice significantly improve safety 33,000 Canadian woman baby undergo cervical ripening year . This pilot trial crucial step towards discovery . Objectives : The primary objective pilot trial determine probability eligible woman agree randomize trial compare 80cc Foleys prostaglandin cervical ripening . This study aim ass possible obtain recruitment rate 20 % . The secondary objective systematic evaluation pilot trial process guide full-scale study design .
